info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 19 at 6:32AM CDT until July 19 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Des Moines IA
info.description:
At 632 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Ankeny, moving southeast at 25 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
This dangerous storm will be near... Des Moines, Ankeny, Altoona, Saylorville, Weh-Weh-Neh-Kee State Park, Margo Frankel Woods State Park, and Ankeny Regional Airport around 640 AM CDT. Bondurant, Adventureland Amusement Park, and Prairie Meadows around 645 AM CDT.
Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Margo Frankel Woods State Park, Ankeny Regional Airport, Elkhart, Weh-Weh-Neh-Kee State Park, and Alleman.
This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 87 and 98. Interstate 80 between mile markers 133 and 148. Interstate 235 between mile markers 9 and 14.
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL POLK COUNTY
